metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11653 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Varnish Cache before 6.0.6 LTS, 6.1.x and 6.2.x before 6.2.3, and 6.3.x before 6.3.2. It occurs when communication with a TLS termination proxy uses PROXY version 2. There can be an assertion failure and daemon restart, which causes a performance loss.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvarnishapi2 - 6.4.0-2
varnish - 6.4.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: varnish package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4.0-2').
